title: America Realizing the Informational Skills and Initiative of New Graduates Act of 2017
content: America Realizing the Informational Skills and Initiative of New Graduates Act of 2017 or America RISING Act of 2017 This bill directs the Department of Labor and the Department of Health and Human Services to jointly establish a grant program to defray the costs paid by: (1) employers to compensate recent college graduates. And (2) recent college graduates to enroll in postsecondary education courses in mathematics, science, engineering, or technology.
